snapshot.weather_line: Cool and mostly cloudy in Belfast with intermittent showers and light winds.

top_global_headline.title: IMF reiterates support for central bank independence amid global political pressure

top_ai_item.title: FDA and EMA outline shared principles for AI use in drug development

global_news.title: IMF reiterates support for central bank independence
global_news.summary: The IMF reaffirmed the importance of central bank independence, citing risks to financial stability if monetary policy becomes politicised.
global_news.why_it_matters: Reinforces expectations of policy continuity in global markets despite political volatility.

ai_tech.title: FDA and EMA outline shared principles for AI use in drug development
ai_tech.summary: US and European regulators published aligned principles covering data integrity, model validation, and lifecycle oversight for AI systems used in pharmaceutical development.
ai_tech.why_it_matters: Provides clearer regulatory expectations for AI-enabled analytics in regulated manufacturing and R&D.
